trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface using an array whose size is dynamically increased as required.
trans-unit.target: 使用大小会根据需要动态增加的数组来实现 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 接口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> class is designed to hold heterogeneous collections of objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>类旨在保存异类对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: However, it does not always offer the best performance.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它不始终提供最佳性能。

trans-unit.source: Instead, we recommend the following:
trans-unit.target: 相反，我们的建议如下：

trans-unit.source: For a heterogeneous collection of objects, use the `List<Object>` (in C#) or `List(Of Object)` (in Visual Basic) type.
trans-unit.target: 对于异类对象的集合，使用`List<Object>`（在 C# 中) 或`List(Of Object)`（在 Visual Basic 中) 中，键入。

trans-unit.source: For a homogeneous collection of objects, use the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 对于同类对象的集合，使用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>类。

trans-unit.source: See the "Performance Considerations" section in the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> reference topic for a discussion of the relative performance of these classes.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅中的"性能注意事项"部分<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>这些类的相对性能的讨论的参考主题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is not guaranteed to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>不一定进行排序。

trans-unit.source: You must sort the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> by calling its <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Sort%2A> method prior to performing operations (such as <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.BinarySearch%2A>) that require the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 您必须对进行排序<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>通过调用其<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Sort%2A>在执行操作之前的方法 (如<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.BinarySearch%2A>) 需要<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>来进行排序。

trans-unit.source: To maintain a collection that is automatically sorted as new elements are added, you can use the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SortedSet%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要维护添加新元素时会自动进行排序的集合，可以使用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.SortedSet%601>类。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is the number of elements the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是元素的数目<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>可以保存。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: The capacity can be decreased by calling <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.TrimToSize%2A> or by setting the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> property explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用减少容量<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.TrimToSize%2A>或通过设置<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>属性显式。

trans-unit.source: For very large <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> objects, you can increase the maximum capacity to 2 billion elements on a 64-bit system by setting the `enabled` attribute of the configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 对于非常大<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象，你可以通过设置增加到 20 亿元素在 64 位系统上的最大容量`enabled`到的配置元素的属性`true`在运行时环境中。

trans-unit.source: Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用整数索引访问此集合中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Indexes in this collection are zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 在此集合中的索引是从零开始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> collection accepts `null` as a valid value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>集合接受`null`作为有效的值。

trans-unit.source: It also allows duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: 它还允许重名的元素。

trans-unit.source: Using multidimensional arrays as elements in an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> collection is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 使用多维数组中的元素作为<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>不支持的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and initialize an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and how to display its values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>以及如何显示其值。

trans-unit.source: Public static (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 公共静态 (<see langword="Shared" />在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />同时，可以支持多个读取器，只要不修改该集合。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee the thread safety of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />, all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the <see cref="M:System.Collections.ArrayList.Synchronized(System.Collections.IList)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保的线程安全性<see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />，所有操作必须通过返回的包装器来都完成<see cref="M:System.Collections.ArrayList.Synchronized(System.Collections.IList)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> class that is empty and has the default initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 类的新实例，该实例为空并且具有默认初始容量。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>可以保存。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> whose elements are copied to the new list.
trans-unit.target: 其元素已复制到新列表的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> class that contains elements copied from the specified collection and that has the same initial capacity as the number of elements copied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 类的新实例，该类包含从指定集合复制的元素，并具有与复制的元素数相同的初始容量。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>可以保存。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied onto the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> in the same order they are read by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: 将元素复制到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>以相同的顺序由读取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>的<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `c`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`c`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="c" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="c" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements that the new list can initially store.
trans-unit.target: 新列表最初可以存储的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> class that is empty and has the specified initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 类的新实例，该实例为空并且具有指定的初始容量。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>可以保存。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`capacity`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="capacity" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="capacity" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> to wrap.
trans-unit.target: 要包装的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> wrapper for a specific <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: 为特定 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 创建 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 包装。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> wrapper around the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 包装。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Adapter%2A> does not copy the contents of <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Adapter%2A> 不会复制的内容<xref:System.Collections.IList>。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it only creates an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> wrapper around <xref:System.Collections.IList>; therefore, changes to the <xref:System.Collections.IList> also affect the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 相反，而只会创建<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>周围包装<xref:System.Collections.IList>; 因此，更改为<xref:System.Collections.IList>也会影响<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> class provides generic <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Reverse%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.BinarySearch%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Sort%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>类提供了泛型<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Reverse%2A>，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.BinarySearch%2A>和<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Sort%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This wrapper can be a means to use those methods on <xref:System.Collections.IList>; however, performing these generic operations through the wrapper might be less efficient than operations applied directly on the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: 此包装可以是一种方法上使用的那些方法<xref:System.Collections.IList>; 但是，执行通过包装这些泛型操作可能比直接在上应用的操作的效率较低<xref:System.Collections.IList>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: Version Compatibility
trans-unit.target: 版本兼容性

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, calling the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.GetEnumerator%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload on the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> wrapper returned an enumerator that treated the second argument as an upper bound rather than as a count.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 版本 1.0 和 1.1 中，调用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.GetEnumerator%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>上的方法重载<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>包装返回的枚举数上限，而不是计数处理第二个参数。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] the second argument is correctly treated as a count.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]第二个参数正确视为计数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="list" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="list" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be added to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的结尾处的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 将对象添加到 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的结尾处。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> index at which the <paramref name="value" /> has been added.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 索引，已在此处添加了 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> 接受`null`作为有效的值，并允许重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> already equals <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>, the capacity of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>已经等于<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>、 容量的<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>增加通过自动重新分配在内部数组和现有元素被复制到新数组中，在添加新的元素之前。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> is less than <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>, this method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>是小于<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>，此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果容量需要增加以容纳新元素，此方法会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add elements to the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> whose elements should be added to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，其元素应被添加到 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The collection itself cannot be <see langword="null" />, but it can contain elements that are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 集合本身不能为 <see langword="null" />，但它可以包含为 <see langword="null" /> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: Adds the elements of an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 的元素添加到 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> 接受`null`作为有效的值，并允许重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: The order of the elements in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is preserved in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 中的元素的顺序<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>在过程中保留<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> (the current <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> plus the size of the collection) will be greater than <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>, the capacity of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array to accommodate the new elements, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new elements are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果新<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>(当前<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>plus 集合的大小) 将大于<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>、 容量的<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>增加通过自动重新分配以容纳新元素，在内部数组和在添加新的元素之前，现有元素被复制到新数组。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> can accommodate the new elements without increasing the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements to be added.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>可以容纳新元素，而无需增加<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是要添加的元素数。

trans-unit.source: If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new elements, this method becomes an O(`n` + `m`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements to be added and `m` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果增加以容纳新元素所需的容量，此方法会成为 O (`n` + `m`) 操作，其中`n`是要添加的元素的数目和`m`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add elements to the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="c" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="c" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Uses a binary search algorithm to locate a specific element in the sorted <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> or a portion of it.
trans-unit.target: 使用对分检索算法在已排序的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 或它的一部分中查找特定元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches the entire sorted <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> for an element using the default comparer and returns the zero-based index of the element.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认的比较器在整个已排序的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中搜索元素，并返回该元素从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of <paramref name="value" /> in the sorted <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />, if <paramref name="value" /> is found; otherwise, a negative number, which is the bitwise complement of the index of the next element that is larger than <paramref name="value" /> or, if there is no larger element, the bitwise complement of <see cref="P:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <paramref name="value" />，则为排序的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中从零开始的 <paramref name="value" /> 索引；否则为一个负数，它是大于 <paramref name="value" /> 的下一个元素索引的按位求补，或者，如果没有更大的元素，则为 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count" /> 的按位求补。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter and each element of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must implement the <xref:System.IComparable> interface, which is used for comparisons.
trans-unit.target: `value`参数和的每个元素<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>必须实现<xref:System.IComparable>接口，用于比较。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 元素<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>必须已在增加根据定义的排序顺序的值进行排序<xref:System.IComparable>实现; 否则，结果可能不正确。

trans-unit.source: Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using <xref:System.IComparable>.
trans-unit.target: 比较`null`允许与任何类型和使用时不会生成异常<xref:System.IComparable>。

trans-unit.source: When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object.
trans-unit.target: 在排序时，`null`被视为小于任何其他对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>多个元素具有相同的值，该方法返回仅包含一个匹配项，并且可能会返回任何一个匹配项，不一定是第一个。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>不包含指定的值，该方法返回负整数。

trans-unit.source: You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以应用于此负的整数，以获取大于搜索值的第一个元素的索引的按位求补运算 （~）。

trans-unit.source: When inserting the value into the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 插入到的值时<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，此索引应使用的插入点，若要维护的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Searches the entire sorted <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> for an element using the specified comparer and returns the zero-based index of the element.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of <paramref name="value" /> in the sorted <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />, if <paramref name="value" /> is found; otherwise, a negative number, which is the bitwise complement of the index of the next element that is larger than <paramref name="value" /> or, if there is no larger element, the bitwise complement of <see cref="P:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count" />.

trans-unit.source: The comparer customizes how the elements are compared.
trans-unit.target: 比较器自定义如何比较元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> instance as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of elements that the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> can contain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 可包含的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements that the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> can contain.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 可包含的元素数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> can store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> 是的元素数的<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>可以存储。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> is the number of elements that are actually in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> 是中的实际的元素数目<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> is always greater than or equal to <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> 大于或等于始终是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> exceeds <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>超过<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>时添加元素，则自动通过增大容量在复制旧元素和添加新的元素之前重新分配在内部数组。

trans-unit.source: The capacity can be decreased by calling <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.TrimToSize%2A> or by setting the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> property explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用减少容量<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.TrimToSize%2A>或通过设置<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>属性显式。

trans-unit.source: When the value of <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> is set explicitly, the internal array is also reallocated to accommodate the specified capacity.
trans-unit.target: 时的值<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>设置了显式，在内部数组还重新分配以适应指定的容量。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the new capacity.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算 o （1）;将属性设置为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`新容量。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity" /> is set to a value that is less than <see cref="P:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity" /> 已设置为一个小于 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory available on the system.
trans-unit.target: 系统上没有足够的可用内存。

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中移除所有元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> is set to zero, and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> 是设置为零，并且集合的元素对其他对象的引用也被释放。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> 保持不变。

trans-unit.source: To reset the capacity of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, call <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.TrimToSize%2A> or set the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要重置的容量<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，调用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.TrimToSize%2A>或设置<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: Trimming an empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> sets the capacity of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> to the default capacity.
trans-unit.target: 截去空<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>的容量设置<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>到默认的容量。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to.
trans-unit.target: 集合的浅表副本复制仅的元素集合，不论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但它不会复制引用所引用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to.
trans-unit.target: 新集合中的引用都指向原始集合中的引用指向同一对象。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，集合的深层副本复制这些元素，以及由这些元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an element is in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定某元素是否在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="item" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see langword="true" /> 中找到 <paramref name="item" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过调用可确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods on `item` to determine whether item exists.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`以确定是否存在项。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`参数的集合中的对象。

trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 或它的一部分复制到一维数组。

trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它是从 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 复制的元素的目标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 必须具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.target: 指定的数组必须具有兼容类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> can store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> 是的元素数的<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>可以存储。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> is the number of elements that are actually in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> 是中的实际的元素数目<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> is always greater than or equal to <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> 大于或等于始终是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> exceeds <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A> while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>超过<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>时添加元素，则自动通过增大容量在复制旧元素和添加新的元素之前重新分配在内部数组。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list wrapper with a fixed size, where elements are allowed to be modified, but not added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有固定大小的列表包装，其中的元素允许修改，但不允许添加或移除。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> to wrap.
trans-unit.target: 要包装的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> wrapper with a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有固定大小的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 包装。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> wrapper with a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 包装。

trans-unit.source: This wrapper can be used to prevent additions to and deletions from the original <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此包装来防止原始<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The elements can still be modified or replaced.
trans-unit.target: 元素仍可以修改或替换。

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小的集合是只是一个集合的包装器防止添加和移除元素;因此，如果对基础集合，包括添加或移除元素，进行更改的固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的固定大小包装<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用此包装来防止原始<xref:System.Collections.IList>。

trans-unit.target: 元素仍可以修改或替换。

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小的集合是只是一个集合的包装器防止添加和移除元素;因此，如果对基础集合，包括添加或移除元素，进行更改的固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="list" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回循环访问 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回整个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的一个枚举器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于整个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 也会将枚举器放回此位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置上，未定义 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在读取 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 的值之前，必须调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 或 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 之前，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 返回同一对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 将 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>还返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要再次将 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 并接着调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the enumerator for an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, and the enumerator for a range of elements in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取的枚举数<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，和中的元素范围的枚举数<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> section that the enumerator should refer to.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器应引用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 部分从零开始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> section that the enumerator should refer to.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器应引用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 部分中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for a range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中某个范围内的元素的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the specified range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 中指定范围内的元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual C++, `For Each` Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` Visual c + + 中`For Each`Visual Basic) 隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 也会将枚举器放回此位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置上，未定义 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在读取 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 的值之前，必须调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 或 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 之前，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 返回同一对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 将 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>还返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要再次将 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 并接着调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: Version Compatibility
trans-unit.target: 版本兼容性

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, the enumerator for an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> wrapper returned by the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Adapter%2A> method treated the second argument as an upper bound rather than as a count.
trans-unit.target: 中的.NET Framework 版本 1.0 和 1.1 中，枚举数<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>包装返回<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Adapter%2A>方法被视为第二个参数，上限为而不是做一个计数。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] the second argument is correctly treated as a count.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]第二个参数正确视为计数。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the enumerator for an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, and the enumerator for a range of elements in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取的枚举数<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，和中的元素范围的枚举数<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not specify a valid range in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 未在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中指定有效范围。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> index at which the range starts.
trans-unit.target: 范围开始处的从零开始的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the range.
trans-unit.target: 范围中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> which represents a subset of the elements in the source <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />，它表示源 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中元素的子集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> which represents a subset of the elements in the source <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />，它表示源 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中元素的子集。

trans-unit.source: This method does not create copies of the elements.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不创建的元素的副本。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is only a view window into the source <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是仅入到源视图窗口<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: However, all subsequent changes to the source <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must be done through this view window <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，对源的所有后续更改<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>必须通过此视图窗口<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made directly to the source <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, the view window <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is invalidated and any operations on it will return an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接对源进行更改<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，视图窗口<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>失效并对它的任何操作将返回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置和获取的元素范围<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not denote a valid range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 不表示 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中元素的有效范围。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of a value in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> or in a portion of it.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 或它的一部分中某个值的第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 中定位的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，并返回整个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到，则为整个 <paramref name="value" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>搜索向前从第一个元素开始和结束时间的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过调用可确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods on `item` to determine whether item exists.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`以确定是否存在项。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`参数的集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.

trans-unit.target: 空列表中 0（零）为有效值。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> that extends from the specified index to the last element.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，并返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中从指定索引到最后一个元素的元素范围内第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> that extends from <paramref name="startIndex" /> to the last element, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中从 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 到最后一个元素的元素范围内找到 <paramref name="value" /> 的第一个匹配项，则为该项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>处开始向前搜索`startIndex`和结束时间的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from `startIndex` to the end of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`startIndex`到末尾<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过调用可确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods on `item` to determine whether item exists.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`以确定是否存在项。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`参数的集合中的对象。

trans-unit.target: 要插入的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an element into the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将元素插入 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> 接受`null`作为有效的值，并允许重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> already equals <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>, the capacity of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>已经等于<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>、 容量的<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>增加通过自动重新分配在内部数组和现有元素被复制到新数组中，在添加新的元素之前。

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>, `value` is added to the end of <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`等同于<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>，`value`添加到末尾<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，插入点下面的元素将下移以容纳新的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何插入元素到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the new elements should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 应在此处插入新元素的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> whose elements should be inserted into the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，应将其元素插入到 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: The collection itself cannot be <see langword="null" />, but it can contain elements that are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 集合本身不能为 <see langword="null" />，但它可以包含为 <see langword="null" /> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the elements of a collection into the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将集合中的元素插入 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> 接受`null`作为有效的值，并允许重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> (the current <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A> plus the size of the collection) will be greater than <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>, the capacity of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array to accommodate the new elements, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new elements are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果新<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>(当前<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>plus 集合的大小) 将大于<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Capacity%2A>、 容量的<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>增加通过自动重新分配以容纳新元素，在内部数组和在添加新的元素之前，现有元素被复制到新数组。

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>, the elements are added to the end of <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`等同于<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>，元素添加到末尾<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The order of the elements in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is preserved in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 中的元素的顺序<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>在过程中保留<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，插入点下面的元素将下移以容纳新的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n` + `m`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements to be added and `m` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n` + `m`) 操作，其中`n`是要添加的元素的数目和`m`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 是否具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 具有固定大小，则为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小的集合是只是一个集合的包装器防止添加和移除元素;因此，如果对基础集合，包括添加或移除元素，进行更改的固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a fixed-size wrapper around an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的固定大小包装<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是只读的，则为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a read-only wrapper around an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and how to determine if an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建周围的只读包装<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>以及如何确定如果<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的访问（线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对 <see langword="true" /> 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee the thread safety of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Synchronized%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保的线程安全性<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，所有操作必须通过返回的包装器来都完成<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Synchronized%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.SyncRoot%2A>在整个枚举期间。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to synchronize an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, determine if an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is synchronized and use a synchronized <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何同步<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，确定如果<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>同步以及如何使用同步<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置的元素的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A> returns an <xref:System.Object>, so you may need to cast the returned value to the original type in order to manipulate it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A> 返回 <xref:System.Object>，因此，您可能需要将返回的值强制转换为原始类型以便对其进行操作。

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is not a strongly-typed collection.
trans-unit.target: 请务必注意，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> 不是个强类型集合。

trans-unit.source: For a strongly-typed alternative, see <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.
trans-unit.target: 有关强类型替代项，请参见 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> 接受`null`作为有效的值，并允许重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。

trans-unit.source: The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic implements <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A> as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 将 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A> 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算 o （1）;设置属性也是 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and adds several items.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>并添加多个项。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates accessing elements with the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A> property (the indexer in C#), and changing an element by assigning a new value to the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A> property for a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示具有访问元素<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A>属性 （索引器在 C# 中），并通过将新值赋给分配更改元素<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A>的指定索引的属性。

trans-unit.source: The example also shows that the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A> property cannot be used to access or add elements outside the current size of the list.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A>属性不能用于访问或添加外部列表的当前大小的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A> property explicitly to assign values to items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Item%2A>属性显式将值分配给列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a class that inherits an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and adds a method to scramble the list items.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义继承的类<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>并添加一个方法进行编码列表项。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than <see cref="P:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 等于或大于 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence of a value in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> or in a portion of it.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 或它的一部分中某个值的最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 中定位的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，并返回整个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the entire the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在整个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中找到 <paramref name="value" /> 的最后一个匹配项，则为该项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>向后搜索的最后一个元素开始，在第一个元素结束。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods on `item` to determine whether item exists.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`以确定是否存在项。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>和<xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A>方法`item`参数的集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何确定指定的元素的最后一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 中定位的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting index of the backward search.
trans-unit.target: 向后搜索的从零开始的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> that extends from the first element to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，并返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中从第一个元素到指定索引的元素范围内最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> that extends from the first element to <paramref name="startIndex" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到，则返回在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中从第一个元素到 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 的元素范围内找到 <paramref name="value" /> 的最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the first element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是搜索向后开始`startIndex`和结束的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from the beginning of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> to `startIndex`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是从开始处的元素数目<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>到`startIndex`。

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过调用可确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> and <xref:System.IComparable.CompareTo%2A> methods on `item` to determine whether item exists.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> and returns the zero-based index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> that contains the specified number of elements and ends at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，并返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中包含指定的元素数并在指定索引处结束的元素范围内最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of <paramref name="value" /> within the range of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> that contains <paramref name="count" /> number of elements and ends at <paramref name="startIndex" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中到 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 为止包含 <paramref name="count" /> 个元素的这部分元素中找到 <paramref name="value" /> 的最后一个匹配项，则为该项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` minus `count` plus 1, if `count` is greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是搜索向后开始`startIndex`结束`startIndex`减`count`加上 1，如果`count`大于 0。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`count`。

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。

trans-unit.target: 将集合中的元素复制到 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中一定范围的元素上。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> 接受`null`作为有效的值，并允许重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: The order of the elements in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is preserved in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 中的元素的顺序<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>在过程中保留<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n` + 1) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n` + 1) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置和获取的元素范围<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.target: 或
