trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> or a portion of it.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 或它的一部分中的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 对整个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which uses the QuickSort algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，它使用快速排序算法。

trans-unit.source: The QuickSort algorithm is a comparison sort (also called an unstable sort), which means that a "less than or equal to" comparison operation determines which of two elements should occur first in the final sorted list.
trans-unit.target: 快速排序算法是比较 （也称为不稳定排序），这意味着"小于或等于"的排序比较操作将确定这两个元素应首先出现在最后一个已排序的列表。

trans-unit.source: However, if two elements are equal, their original order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其原始顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: To perform a stable sort, you must implement a custom <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface to use with the other overloads of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行一个稳定排序，则必须实现一个自定义<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口若要使用此方法的其他重载。

trans-unit.source: On average, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>; in the worst case it is an O(`n`^2) operation.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>; 在最坏情况下它复杂度为 O (`n`^2) 操作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sort the values in an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何进行排序中的值<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比较元素时要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）将使用每个元数的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in the entire <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> using the specified comparer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的比较器对整个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Sort%2A> method to sort a list of objects with a custom comparer that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Sort%2A> 方法通过实现 <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> 接口的自定义比较器对对象的列表进行排序。

trans-unit.source: If you pass `null` for `comparer`, this method uses the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 `null` 传递 `comparer`，则此方法将使用每个元素的 <xref:System.IComparable> 实现。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must make sure that the objects contained in the list implement the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface or an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，您必须确保列表中包含的对象实现 <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> 接口，否则将发生异常。

trans-unit.source: In addition, using the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation means the list performs a comparison sort (also called an unstable sort); that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用 <xref:System.IComparable> 实现意味着此列表将执行比较排序（也称为“不稳定排序”）；也就是说，如果两个元素相等，则可能不会保留其顺序。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: To perform a stable sort, you must implement a custom <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行一个稳定排序，则必须实现一个自定义<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口。

trans-unit.source: On average, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>; in the worst case it is an O(`n`^2) operation.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>; 在最坏情况下它复杂度为 O (`n`^2) 操作。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何进行排序中的值<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>使用默认比较器和将反转排序顺序的自定义比较器。

trans-unit.target: 要排序的范围的长度。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> implementation to use when comparing elements.
trans-unit.target: 比较元素时要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 实现。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> implementation of each element.
trans-unit.target: null 引用（Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）将使用每个元数的 <see cref="T:System.IComparable" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the elements in a range of elements in <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> using the specified comparer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的比较器对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中某个范围内的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is set to `null`, this method performs a comparison sort (also called an unstable sort); that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`设置为`null`，此方法将执行比较排序 （也称为不稳定排序）; 即，如果两个元素相等，其顺序可能不会保留。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: To perform a stable sort, you must implement a custom <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行一个稳定排序，则必须实现一个自定义<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口。

trans-unit.source: On average, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `count`; in the worst case it is an O(n^2) operation.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，此方法为 O (`n`日志`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`count`; 在最坏情况下此操作是 O(n^2) 操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list wrapper that is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 返回同步的（线程安全）列表包装。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> to synchronize.
trans-unit.target: 要同步的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> wrapper that is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 返回同步的（线程安全）<see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 包装。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> wrapper that is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 同步的（线程安全）<see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 包装。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee the thread safety of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, all operations must be done through this wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保的线程安全性<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，必须通过此包装器完成所有操作。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.SyncRoot%2A>在整个枚举期间。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: To create a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, use the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Synchronized%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的同步的版本<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，使用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Synchronized%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> using the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，派生的类可以提供自己的同步的版本<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>使用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.SyncRoot%2A> of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, not directly on the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 同步代码必须在执行操作<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.SyncRoot%2A>的<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，而不是直接在<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object.
trans-unit.target: 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.target: 指定元素类型的数组，它包含 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 中元素的副本。

trans-unit.target: 中的对象的所有<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象强制转换为<xref:System.Type>中指定`type`参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to minimize a collection's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于降低集合的内存开销，如果没有新的元素将添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: To reset a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> to its initial state, call the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Clear%2A> method before calling <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.TrimToSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要重置<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>为其初始状态，请在调用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Clear%2A>方法之前调用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.TrimToSize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Trimming an empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> sets the capacity of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> to the default capacity.
trans-unit.target: 截去空<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>的容量设置<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>到默认的容量。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to trim the unused portions of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and how to clear the values of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何修整的未使用的部分<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>以及如何清除的值<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 具有固定的大小。
